name: Blue Regular Car
description: A stylish blue regular car with smooth wheels and comfortable seating. Perfect for casual playtime adventures.

name: Green Regular Car
description: A vibrant green regular car with realistic engine sounds and working headlights. Ready to take your little one on exciting imaginary journeys.

name: Red Sports Car
description: An eye-catching red sports car with sleek design and high-speed capabilities. Perfect for racing and thrilling adventures.

name: Yellow Sports Car
description: A cool yellow sports car with working doors and adjustable seats. Get ready for action-packed fun and exciting road trips.

name: Black Police Car
description: A black police car with realistic sirens and flashing lights. Help enforce the law and keep the imaginary city safe.

name: White Police Car
description: A white police car with sound effects and removable police officer figure. Join the force and solve exciting pretend play cases.
